casebody.data:
Second Department,

January, 1954.

(January 11, 1954.) Joseph G. Cohen, Respondent, v. Samuel Wacht, Jr., et al., Appellants.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. The time of appellants to answer is extended until ten days after the entry of the order hereon. Present — Adel, Acting P. J., Wenzel, Schmidt, Beldock and Murphy, JJ. [See 282 App. Div. 1054.]
